ValidationRule.description: CFS Score must be between 1-5 for Inbound Implementation Meetings
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Completed"), OR(RecordType.Name ='Pipeline Inbound Implementation Content Meeting', RecordType.Name ='Pipeline Inbound Implementation Kickoff Meeting', RecordType.Name ='Pipeline Inbound Implementation Messaging Meeting', RecordType.Name ='Pipeline Inbound Implementation Website Reveal Meeting', RecordType.Name ='Pipeline Inbound Implementation Wrap-Up Meeting'), OR(ISBLANK(Rate_Likelihood_of_Renewing_Year_2__c), Rate_Likelihood_of_Renewing_Year_2__c >5, Rate_Likelihood_of_Renewing_Year_2__c <1))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill out Confidence in Future Success between 1 - 5.
